output_list.description: The transfer function does not check if the recipient's balance will overflow after the transfer. This can lead to a loss of funds if the recipient's balance is at its maximum value.
The approve function does not check if the allowance will overflow after the approval. This can lead to a loss of funds if the allowance is at its maximum value.
The transferFrom function does not check if the recipient's balance will overflow after the transfer. This can lead to a loss of funds if the recipient's balance is at its maximum value.
The mintToken function does not check if the total supply will overflow after the minting. This can lead to a loss of funds if the total supply is at its maximum value.
The buy function does not check if the contract's balance will overflow after the purchase. This can lead to a loss of funds if the contract's balance is at its maximum value.
